name: Red Bounce Ball Heroes
description:
Red Bounce Ball Heroes is one of the most interesting bouncing ball games. With the simple control and challenging adventures, Red
bounce ball has been beautifully designed for players with all age groups.
Roll, jump, and bounce the roller ball through a mechanical wasteland, the player needs to ensure that the moving ball does not hit the square
shapes and Circles.


HOW TO PLAY
Use right and left button to roll the ball
Use up button to jump ball
Collect coin as many as possible

FEATURE
Smooth control
New Graphics, effects and sounds
New Skins
